allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix BigInt serialization error in cache-streamers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ScrapeCreators integration for social platforms

- Add scrapeCreatorsService for TikTok/Instagram/X/Facebook/LinkedIn
- Add SocialSyncQueue model for credit-efficient batch processing
- Add admin API endpoints for social sync management
- Add cron jobs for automated social platform syncing
- Priority-based queue \(higher follower streamers first\)
- Extract social handles from existing Twitch/Kick/YouTube streamers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ScrapeCreators API response parsing

- Handle TikTok response structure \(user + stats objects\)
- Convert string stats to numbers
- Handle undefined values gracefully

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
